clv:ComponentDefinition.clv:Title: CAN Network
clv:ComponentDefinition.clv:Desc: Models a network for protocol Controller Area Network (CAN).

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Nodes to generate
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: List of nodes to generate C-code for.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Generate files full name
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: If set to "True" always uses full name for CAN generated C-code. Full name includes network and node name in the file in most of the cases. If set to "False" automatically determine if full names are required (generating more than one node in a given network or multiple networks) or not.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Prefix for data types enumerated symbols
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Prefix for data types enumerated symbols. Use $ to indicate an empty string. Use ${NWID} to indicate the network ID.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Prefix for type names of signal enumerations
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Prefix for type names of signal enumerations. Leave empty to name the generated types exactly as the source data_type. Use ${DATATYPE} to indicate the Data_Type name.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Msg search algorithms
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Type of search algorithms to implement for processing RX can messages.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Msg search algorithm
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Type of search algorithms to use for processing RX can messages.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Msg search algorithm - Parameter 1
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Parameter 1 of the selected search algorithm.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Msg search algorithm - Parameter 2
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Parameter 2 of the selected search algorithm.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Msgs timeout starts at init
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: If set to true timeout of rx CAN messages will start counting down from init. If set to false, user will need to start the timeout manually.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Period of TX task
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Period of TX task for transmission of spontaneous messages.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Period of RX task
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Period of task for polling spontaneous RX messages.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Length of queue for TX messages
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Length of queue of messages waiting for transmission.

clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Title: Time in ms of TX queue task
clv:ParamDefinition.clv:Desc: Time in ms of TX queue task.
